name: get_spend_summary
description: Get total spending summary including income, expenses, and net balance for a specified period. Must specify 'type' as either 'transactions' (main bank transactions) or 'travelbuddy' (travel card transactions). For travelbuddy, use 'subtype=combine' to include both Load and Transaction data.

type.description: Required. Data source: 'transactions' for main bank transactions or 'travelbuddy' for travel buddy card transactions

subtype.description: For travelbuddy only. Use 'combine' to include both Load (as income) and Transaction (as spend) sheets. Without this, only Transaction sheet spend is returned.

period.description: Time period: yesterday, week, month, last_month, year, all_time, OR specific month like 'august_2024', 'aug_2024', '8_2024', '2024_8'. Also supports week of month like 'week_1_august_2024', 'first_week_of_november_2024'

name: get_detailed_breakdown
description: Get comprehensive detailed spending breakdown including summary, categories, top merchants, transaction types, and daily timeline in one call. Use this when user asks for 'detailed info', 'detailed breakdown', 'complete breakdown', or 'full details' about their spending.

type.description: Required. Data source: 'transactions' for main wallet or 'travelbuddy' for travel card

period.description: Time period: yesterday, week, month, last_month, year, OR specific month like 'october_2025', 'oct_2025'

name: get_spend_by_category
description: Get spending breakdown by MCC category. Must specify 'type' as either 'transactions' (main wallet) or 'travelbuddy' (travel card).

type.description: Required. Data source: 'transactions' for main wallet or 'travelbuddy' for travel card

period.description: Time period: yesterday, week, month, last_month, year, OR specific month like 'august_2024', 'nov_2024', '8_2024'

name: get_top_merchants
description: Get top merchants by spending amount. Must specify 'type' as either 'transactions' (main wallet) or 'travelbuddy' (travel card).

type.description: Required. Data source: 'transactions' for main wallet or 'travelbuddy' for travel card

limit.description: Maximum number of merchants to return (default: 10)

name: get_spend_trend
description: Get month-over-month spending trend comparison

months.description: Number of months to include in trend (default: 6)

name: find_transactions
description: Search transactions by merchant name or description

query.description: Search query for merchant name or transaction description

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

name: get_subscription_list
description: Detect potential recurring payments and subscriptions

name: get_daily_spend
description: Get daily spending timeline breakdown. Must specify 'type' as either 'transactions' (main wallet) or 'travelbuddy' (travel card).

type.description: Required. Data source: 'transactions' for main wallet or 'travelbuddy' for travel card

period.description: Time period for daily breakdown (default: week)

name: get_category_spend
description: Get detailed spending for a specific category. Must specify 'type' as either 'transactions' (main wallet) or 'travelbuddy' (travel card).

type.description: Required. Data source: 'transactions' for main wallet or 'travelbuddy' for travel card

category.description: Category name to filter (e.g., Food, Travel, Shopping)

name: flag_unusual_activity
description: Detect unusual or large spending transactions (outliers)

period.description: Time period to analyze for unusual activity

name: get_trip_list
description: List all identified travel trips based on foreign currency transactions

name: get_trip_spend
description: Get detailed spending breakdown for a specific trip

name: get_trip_load_vs_spend
description: Compare travel wallet loaded amount vs spent amount for a trip

name: compare_trip_costs
description: Compare spending between two trips

name: get_trip_currency_mix
description: Get currency usage breakdown for a specific trip

name: get_remittance_summary
description: Get monthly or yearly remittance summary with totals, count, and averages

year.description: Year for the summary (default: current year)

month.description: Month number (1-12) for month-wise filtering. Use with year for specific month like August 2024

name: get_recipient_stats
description: Get remittance statistics for a specific recipient

recipient_name.description: Name of the beneficiary/recipient to search for

name: get_remittance_trend
description: Get year-over-year remittance trend comparison

years.description: Number of years to include in trend (default: 3)

name: find_remittances
description: Search remittance transactions by purpose or beneficiary name

query.description: Search query for purpose of payment or beneficiary name

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

name: latest_fx_rate
description: Get current exchange rate for a currency (mock/live)

currency.description: Currency code (e.g., INR, PHP, USD, EUR, GBP)

name: get_reward_summary
description: Get total rewards summary including points, cashback, and tier status. Use 'type' to filter by specific sheet: 'transactions' for card transactions, 'load' for wallet loads, 'flyy_points' for Flyy points, or 'all' for combined summary.

type.description: Data source: 'transactions' for card transactions, 'load' for wallet loads, 'flyy_points' for Flyy points, or 'all' for combined summary (default: all)

period.description: Time period: yesterday, week, month, last_month, year, OR specific month like 'august_2024', 'nov_2024'

name: get_reward_activity
description: Get rewards activity history by period. Use 'type' to filter by specific sheet: 'transactions' for card transactions, 'load' for wallet loads, 'flyy_points' for Flyy points, or 'all' for combined activity.

type.description: Data source: 'transactions' for card transactions, 'load' for wallet loads, 'flyy_points' for Flyy points, or 'all' for combined activity (default: all)

name: get_reward_expiry_alerts
description: Get alerts for points expiring soon

name: get_best_reward_strategy
description: Get best rewards strategy recommendation for a spending category

name: get_savings_rate
description: Get savings rate analysis (income vs expense ratio)

name: predict_next_month_spend
description: Predict next month spending based on historical trends

category.description: Optional category to predict spending for

months.description: Number of historical months to use for prediction

name: optimize_budget
description: Get budget optimization and savings suggestions

name: set_spend_alert
description: Set a spending alert for a category threshold

threshold.description: Spending threshold amount to trigger alert

description: Get current wallet balance

name: explain_category
description: Get voice-friendly explanation of a spending category or term
